title: Simulator-Based Intensive Programming Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming syntax and algorithm comprehension
context.additional_context: Students use personal devices (BYOD) to practice in real-time simulator environments, gaining experience in solving diverse programming problems. Learning outcomes are continuously monitored through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Improve creative problem-solving skills by resolving three or more programming problem scenarios using a simulator
Achieve over 80% behavioral and emotional engagement metrics in simulator-based learning
Conduct five or more code review experiences through collaboration with peers
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
